Closure Maven Plugin
Last Published: 2016-09-27  | Version: 1.2.0

  • JS Compiler Flags

closure:generate-closure-sources

Full name:

com.google.closure:closure-maven-plugin:1.2.0:generate-closure-sources

Description:

Generates .js and .java sources from .proto and .soy and compiles .js and .css to optimized bundles.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: compile+runtime.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: process-sources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
closureOutputDirectory File - Directory root for compiled CSS and JS and other resources that are useful on the client including the CSS rename map and CSS and JS source maps. By default, this is under the classes directory so these files will be packaged in the project JAR making these available as resources on the class-path under "/closure/…".
Default value is: ${project.build.outputDirectory}/closure.
User property is: closureOutputDirectory.
genJavaPackageName String - The package name for generated Java classes.
Default value is: ${project.groupId}.
javaGenfiles File - The source root for generated .java files.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/src/main/java.
User property is: javaGenfiles.
javaTestGenfiles File - The source root for generated .java test files.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/src/test/java.
User property is: javaTestGenfiles.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
css ImmutableList$Builder - Options for the closure-stylesheets compiler. May be specified multiple times to generate different variants, for example one stylesheet for left-to-right languages like English and one for right-to-left languages like Arabic.
extracts Extracts - The dependencies from which to extract supplementary source files.
js ImmutableList$Builder - Options for the closure-compiler.

May be specified multiple times to generate different variants, for example with different --defines.


User property is: js.
proto ProtoOptions - Options for the protocol buffer compiler.
soy SoyOptions - Options for the closure template compiler.

Parameter Details

closureOutputDirectory:

Directory root for compiled CSS and JS and other resources that are useful on the client including the CSS rename map and CSS and JS source maps. By default, this is under the classes directory so these files will be packaged in the project JAR making these available as resources on the class-path under "/closure/…".
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: closureOutputDirectory
  • Default: ${project.build.outputDirectory}/closure

css:

Options for the closure-stylesheets compiler. May be specified multiple times to generate different variants, for example one stylesheet for left-to-right languages like English and one for right-to-left languages like Arabic.
  • Type: com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList$Builder
  • Required: No

extracts:

The dependencies from which to extract supplementary source files.
  • Type: com.google.closure.plugin.extract.Extracts
  • Required: No

genJavaPackageName:

The package name for generated Java classes.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.groupId}

javaGenfiles:

The source root for generated .java files.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: javaGenfiles
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/src/main/java

javaTestGenfiles:

The source root for generated .java test files.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: javaTestGenfiles
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/src/test/java

js:

Options for the closure-compiler.

May be specified multiple times to generate different variants, for example with different --defines.

  • Type: com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList$Builder
  • Required: No
  • User Property: js

proto:

Options for the protocol buffer compiler.
  • Type: com.google.closure.plugin.proto.ProtoOptions
  • Required: No

soy:

Options for the closure template compiler.
  • Type: com.google.closure.plugin.soy.SoyOptions
  • Required: No
